verses.verse: ( The Offering of Isaac) ( 500 3:1-21 ) וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> way·hî - אַחַר֙ <WH310> ’a·ḥar Some time later הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> had·də·ḇā·rîm ... הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> hā·’êl·leh ... וְהָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> wə·hā·’ĕ·lō·hîm God נִסָּ֖ה <WH5254> nis·sāh tested אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām Abraham וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer and said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> ’ê·lāw to him, אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām “ Abraham! ” וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer he answered. הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2009> hin·nê·nî “ Here I am, ”

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer [God] said, קַח־ <WH3947> qaḥ- “ Take נָ֠א <WH4994> nā ... אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בִּנְךָ֙ <WH1121> bin·ḵå̄ your son, ” אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יְחִֽידְךָ֤ <WH3173> yə·ḥî·ḏə·ḵā “ your only אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- whom אָהַ֙בְתָּ֙ <WH157> ’ā·haḇ·tā you love, אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> yiṣ·ḥāq son Isaac, וְלֶךְ־ <WH1980> wə·leḵ- and go לְךָ֔ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) to אֶ֖רֶץ 776 N-fsc ( ’e·reṣ) the land הַמֹּרִיָּ֑ה 4179 Art│N-proper-fs ( ham·mō·rî·yāh) of Moriah. וְהַעֲלֵ֤הוּ 5927 Conj-w│V-Hifil-Imp-ms│3ms ( wə·ha·‘ă·lê·hū) Offer him שָׁם֙ 8033 Adv ( šām) there לְעֹלָ֔ה 5930 Prep-l│N-fs ( lə·‘ō·lāh) as a burnt offering עַ֚ל 5921 Prep ( ‘al) on אַחַ֣ד 259 Number-msc ( ’a·ḥaḏ) one הֶֽהָרִ֔ים 2022 Art│N-mp ( he·hā·rîm) of the mountains, אֲשֶׁ֖ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) which אֹמַ֥ר 559 V-Qal-Imperf-1cs ( ’ō·mar) I will show אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ 413 Prep│2ms ( ’ê·le·ḵā) you. ”

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <WH7925> way·yaš·kêm got up early אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām So Abraham בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> bab·bō·qer the next morning, וַֽיַּחֲבֹשׁ֙ <WH2280> way·ya·ḥă·ḇōš saddled אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - חֲמֹר֔וֹ <WH2543> ḥă·mō·rōw his donkey, וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> way·yiq·qaḥ and took אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> šə·nê two נְעָרָיו֙ <WH5288> nə·‘ā·rāw of his servants אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> ’it·tōw along וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> wə·’êṯ - יִצְחָ֣ק <WH3327> yiṣ·ḥāq Isaac. בְּנ֑וֹ <WH1121> bə·nōw and his son וַיְבַקַּע֙ <WH1234> way·ḇaq·qa‘ He split עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> ‘ă·ṣê the wood עֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> ‘ō·lāh for a burnt offering וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> way·yā·qām and set out for וַיֵּ֔לֶךְ <WH1980> way·yê·leḵ ... אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- ... הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> ham·mā·qō·wm the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - אָֽמַר־ <WH559> ’ā·mar- had designated ל֥וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) .... הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ 430 Art│N-mp ( hā·’ĕ·lō·hîm) God

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bay·yō·wm day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <WH7992> haš·šə·lî·šî On the third וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> way·yiś·śā looked up אַבְרָהָ֧ם <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עֵינָ֛יו <WH5869> ‘ê·nāw ... וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> way·yar and saw אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> ham·mā·qō·wm the place מֵרָחֹֽק׃ <WH7350> mê·rā·ḥōq in the distance.

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer told אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām Abraham אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- ... נְעָרָ֗יו <WH5288> nə·‘ā·rāw his servants. שְׁבוּ־ <WH3427> šə·ḇū- “ Stay לָכֶ֥ם Prep│2mp ( lā·ḵem) פֹּה֙ 6311 Adv ( pōh) here עִֽם־ 5973 Prep ( ‘im-) with הַחֲמ֔וֹר 2543 Art│N-ms ( ha·ḥă·mō·wr) the donkey, ” וַאֲנִ֣י 589 Conj-w│Pro-1cs ( wa·’ă·nî) and I וְהַנַּ֔עַר 5288 Conj-w, Art│N-ms ( wə·han·na·‘ar) “ The boy נֵלְכָ֖ה 1980 V-Qal-Imperf. Cohort-1cp ( nê·lə·ḵāh) will go עַד־ 5704 Prep ( ‘aḏ-) over כֹּ֑ה 3541 Adv ( kōh) there וְנִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֖ה 7812 Conj-w│V-Hitpael-ConjImperf-1cp ( wə·niš·ta·ḥă·weh) to worship, וְנָשׁ֥וּבָה 7725 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjImperf. Cohort-1cp ( wə·nā·šū·ḇāh) and then we will return אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ 413 Prep│2mp ( ’ă·lê·ḵem) to you. ”

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> way·yiq·qaḥ took אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> ‘ă·ṣê the wood הָעֹלָ֗ה <WH5930> hā·‘ō·lāh for the burnt offering וַיָּ֙שֶׂם֙ <WH7760> way·yā·śem and placed עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- it on יִצְחָ֣ק <WH3327> yiṣ·ḥāq Isaac. בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> bə·nōw his son וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> way·yiq·qaḥ He himself carried בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> bə·yā·ḏōw ... אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> hā·’êš the fire וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - הַֽמַּאֲכֶ֑לֶת <WH3979> ham·ma·’ă·ḵe·leṯ and the sacrificial knife, וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> way·yê·lə·ḵū of them walked on שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8147> šə·nê·hem and the two יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> yaḥ·dāw together.

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said יִצְחָ֜ק <WH3327> yiṣ·ḥāq Then Isaac אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to אַבְרָהָ֤ם <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām Abraham אָבִיו֙ <WH1> ’ā·ḇîw his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer -, אָבִ֔י <WH1> ’ā·ḇî “ My father! ” וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer he replied. הִנֶּ֣נִּֽי <WH2009> hin·nen·nî “ Here I am, בְנִ֑י <WH1121> ḇə·nî my son, ” וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said Isaac, הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> hin·nêh are here, ” הָאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> hā·’êš “ The fire וְהָ֣עֵצִ֔ים <WH6086> wə·hā·‘ê·ṣîm and the wood וְאַיֵּ֥ה <WH346> wə·’ay·yêh “ but where הַשֶּׂ֖ה <WH7716> haś·śeh is the lamb לְעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> lə·‘ō·lāh for the burnt offering? ”

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> way·yō·mer answered, אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām Abraham אֱלֹהִ֞ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm “ God יִרְאֶה־ <WH7200> yir·’eh- will provide לּ֥וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) Himself הַשֶּׂ֛ה 7716 Art│N-ms ( haś·śeh) the lamb לְעֹלָ֖ה 5930 Prep-l│N-fs ( lə·‘ō·lāh) for the burnt offering, בְּנִ֑י 1121 N-msc│1cs ( bə·nî) my son. ” וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ 1980 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3mp ( way·yê·lə·ḵū) walked on שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם 8147 Number-mdc│3mp ( šə·nê·hem) And the two יַחְדָּֽו׃ 3162 Adv ( yaḥ·dāw) together.

וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> way·yā·ḇō·’ū When they arrived אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- at הַמָּקוֹם֮ <WH4725> ham·mā·qō·wm the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer אָֽמַר־ <WH559> ’ā·mar- had designated ל֣וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) ..., הָאֱלֹהִים֒ 430 Art│N-mp ( hā·’ĕ·lō·hîm) God וַיִּ֨בֶן 1129 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yi·ḇen) built שָׁ֤ם 8033 Adv ( šām) there אַבְרָהָם֙ 85 N-proper-ms ( ’aḇ·rā·hām) Abraham אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ 4196 Art│N-ms ( ham·miz·bê·aḥ) the altar וַֽיַּעֲרֹ֖ךְ 6186 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·ya·‘ă·rōḵ) and arranged אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - הָעֵצִ֑ים 6086 Art│N-mp ( hā·‘ê·ṣîm) the wood. וַֽיַּעֲקֹד֙ 6123 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·ya·‘ă·qōḏ) He bound אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - יִצְחָ֣ק 3327 N-proper-ms ( yiṣ·ḥāq) Isaac בְּנ֔וֹ 1121 N-msc│3ms ( bə·nōw) his son וַיָּ֤שֶׂם 7760 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yā·śem) and placed אֹתוֹ֙ 853 DirObjM│3ms ( ’ō·ṯōw) him עַל־ 5921 Prep ( ‘al-) on הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ 4196 Art│N-ms ( ham·miz·bê·aḥ) the altar, מִמַּ֖עַל 4605 Prep-m│Adv ( mim·ma·‘al) atop לָעֵצִֽים׃ 6086 Prep-l, Art│N-mp ( lā·‘ê·ṣîm) the wood.

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> way·yiš·laḥ reached out אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām Then Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> yā·ḏōw his hand וַיִּקַּ֖ח <WH3947> way·yiq·qaḥ and took אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַֽמַּאֲכֶ֑לֶת <WH3979> ham·ma·’ă·ḵe·leṯ the knife לִשְׁחֹ֖ט <WH7819> liš·ḥōṭ to slaughter אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> bə·nōw his son.

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> way·yiq·rā called out אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> ’ê·lāw to him ( The LORD Provides the Sacrifice) מַלְאַ֤ךְ <WH4397> mal·’aḵ Just then the angel ( Or Angel; also in verses 12 and 15) יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> haš·šā·ma·yim heaven וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer -, אַבְרָהָ֣ם׀ <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām “ Abraham, אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām Abraham! ” וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer he replied. הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2009> hin·nê·nî “ Here I am, ”

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said [the angel], אַל־ <WH408> ’al- “ Do not תִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> tiš·laḥ lay יָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> yā·ḏə·ḵā a hand אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- on הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> han·na·‘ar the boy וְאַל־ <WH408> wə·’al- ... תַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> ta·‘aś or do ל֖וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) to him, ” מְא֑וּמָּה 3972 N-ms ( mə·ʾūm·må̄h) anything כִּ֣י׀ 3588 Conj ( kî) “ for עַתָּ֣ה 6258 Adv ( ‘at·tāh) now יָדַ֗עְתִּי 3045 V-Qal-Perf-1cs ( yā·ḏa‘·tî) I know כִּֽי־ 3588 Conj ( kî-) that יְרֵ֤א 3373 Adj-msc ( yə·rê) fear אֱלֹהִים֙ 430 N-mp ( ’ĕ·lō·hîm) God, אַ֔תָּה 859 Pro-2ms ( ’at·tāh) you וְלֹ֥א 3808 Conj-w│Adv-NegPrt ( wə·lō) since you have not חָשַׂ֛כְתָּ 2820 V-Qal-Perf-2ms ( ḥā·śaḵ·tā) withheld אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - בִּנְךָ֥ 1121 N-msc│2ms ( bin·ḵā) son אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - יְחִידְךָ֖ 3173 Adj-msc│2ms ( yə·ḥî·ḏə·ḵā) your only מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ 4480 Prep│1cs ( mim·men·nî) from me. ”

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> way·yiś·śā looked up אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām Then Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> ‘ê·nāw ... וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> way·yar and saw וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> wə·hin·nêh- אַ֔יִל <WH352> ’a·yil a ram ( Most MT manuscripts; other Hebrew manuscripts, SP, LXX, and Syriac saw one ram) אַחַ֕ר <WH310> ’a·ḥar behind [him] נֶאֱחַ֥ז <WH270> ne·’ĕ·ḥaz caught בַּסְּבַ֖ךְ <WH5442> bas·sə·ḇaḵ in a thicket, בְּקַרְנָ֑יו <WH7161> bə·qar·nāw by its horns. וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> way·yê·leḵ went אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām So [he] וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> way·yiq·qaḥ and took אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָאַ֔יִל <WH352> hā·’a·yil the ram וַיַּעֲלֵ֥הוּ <WH5927> way·ya·‘ă·lê·hū and offered לְעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> lə·‘ō·lāh it as a burnt offering תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> ta·ḥaṯ in place of בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> bə·nōw his son.

וַיִּקְרָ֧א <WH7121> way·yiq·rā called אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> ’aḇ·rā·hām And Abraham שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> šêm- ... הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> ham·mā·qō·wm place הַה֖וּא <WH1931> ha·hū that יְהוָ֣ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD יִרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> yir·’eh Will Provide. ( Hebrew YHWH Yireh) אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> ’ă·šer So יֵאָמֵ֣ר <WH559> yê·’ā·mêr it is said, הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> hay·yō·wm to this day בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> bə·har “ On the mountain יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD יֵרָאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> yê·rā·’eh it will be provided. ”
